name: Meek Demo
description:
Meek DEMO
⚠️Having trouble loading or lag? try turbowarp ⚠️
[ READ THIS: If you are stuck on the double jump part, keep moving horizontally, dont wait until you fall back down and then do a double jump, thats not how the game physics work, if you want to learn the code, you can go ahead and see inside ]

[ANOTHER MESSAGE: if you sometimes hear a different overworld theme, here is the game from the original track: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/522034803/ (GO PLAY IT) ]

INSTURCTIONS 

Left and Right Arrow key - run Up arrow - Jump Down Arrow - Crouch X - Throw/un-attach Hand, Airkick Z - walk Q - Show Input Display ------------------------------------------------------------------------- CREDITS ----------------------------------------
Music And Programming and art by Me. Feedback From a lot of people ( thanks if you were one of them )  NOTES: The Bees in the game aren't actual bees, this doesnt count as animal abuse, bees are actually really good bugs that helps the earth's ecosystem also this is a parcour-ish styled game, you basically have to master some stuff in order to win
